p:
Homodimeric P-domain capsid models were constructed for syh1, syh2, and syh3 using Phyre
1 based on the template of NV GII.4 strain VA387 (c2obtA). The aa differences in the antigenic and HBGA-binding sites among syh1, syh2, syh3, and VA387 were plotted onto P-domain homology models to illustrate sequence variations.
